Sentencas: Effect of Sc-doping on crystal structure, morphology and conductivity of SrHfO3 was studied for the first time.
Titulo: Effect of scandium on the phase composition, microstructure and electrical conductivity of strontium hafnate

Sentencas: SrHf1-xScxO3-$ (x = 0-0.15) was synthesized by solid state reaction and examined using Rietveld refinement of X-ray diffraction patterns, scanning electron microscopy and four-probe DC technique.
Titulo: Effect of scandium on the phase composition, microstructure and electrical conductivity of strontium hafnate

Sentencas: It was shown that scandium incorporates into the crystal lattice of SrHfO3 and SrHf1-xScxO3-$ crystallizes in the orthorhombic Pbnm space group.
Titulo: Effect of scandium on the phase composition, microstructure and electrical conductivity of strontium hafnate

Sentencas: Sc-doping enhances the grain growth and sinterability, which results in increased density of ceramics.
Titulo: Effect of scandium on the phase composition, microstructure and electrical conductivity of strontium hafnate

Sentencas: The conductivity of SrHf1-xScxO3-$ increases with increasing Sccontent, which is consistent with the common model of oxygen vacancies formation.
Titulo: Effect of scandium on the phase composition, microstructure and electrical conductivity of strontium hafnate

Sentencas: Increase in conductivity with increasing water vapor partial pressure indicates a significant contribution of protons to charge transport.
Titulo: Effect of scandium on the phase composition, microstructure and electrical conductivity of strontium hafnate

Sentencas: High ionic conductivity is combined with high ion transference numbers, which makes SrHf1-xScxO3-$ promising electrolytes for use in electrolysis cells producing clean hydrogen from steam and fuel cells converting chemical energy into electricity.& COPY; 2023 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Effect of scandium on the phase composition, microstructure and electrical conductivity of strontium hafnate
